Author: manofthestars
Content:
I need your help with a survey about linguistics, especially regarding prescriptivism and descriptivism.
I'm helping out my gf with her college assignment
https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSeooXzJV-2vU5WTknVOv8fOjdYBy0iiZvgw_F-TyCFGhIXRKA/viewform?usp=publish-editor

Author: manofthestars
Content:
For context:

Prescriptivism sets rules for how language should be used, while descriptivism observes how language is actually used by speakers.
